context: A link in an email quarantined by zero-hour auto purge (ZAP) was accessed by a user, triggering a Microsoft Defender for Office 365 alert.
question: Can you provide the URL that was accessed by the user in the ZAP-quarantined email?
solution_steps: Multiple dual-purpose tools were dropped by the user with SID `S-5-7-21-1843151660-3234030288-105586167-1422`.
A user accessed a link in a ZAP-quarantined email with URL `https://ac27145722.livelygrass-8d4c4013.eastus2.azurecontainerapps.io/`.
